Articles.Content:
I would like to build an SSTO (plane) and would like to have some of the basic tips before I start.

Links to tutorials you like would be nice.

Made just for you: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/52080-Basic-Aircraft-Design-Explained-Simply-With-Pictures

Also, search Google, Youtube, and the forums; they have plenty of resources for this kind of stuff.

Edited January 29, 2015 by Tank Buddy

Ka-ching: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/100334-SSTO-Why-u-no-fly?p=1546536&viewfull=1#post1546536

Spoiler - I'm not adding much to the table that hasn't already been said...a mere three posts into the thread...

On the other hand, not much changed spaceplane-wise in between 0.90 and 0.25 except for the Mk3 spaceplane parts, and none of them are lifting bodies (unlike the Mk2 spaceplane parts), so any advice that mentions 0.25 is still sound as of this post.
